transArray.content: I have stayed in several citigos, and the service is very good and warm, and the configuration is also very complete. Because this shop has no windows, the house is very stuffy. I wanted to turn on the air conditioner, but the air conditioner didn't work. The sound insulation effect is not good. The neighbor next door is coughing and blowing his nose after 6 o'clock in the morning, which can be heard clearly.
